meanings.sent1: She is the leadiest student in the class.
meanings.sent2: The leadiest pencil in the box was the yellow one.
meanings.sent3: The leadiest cookie in the jar magically disappeared.
meanings.sent4: Her leadiest dance move stole the show.
meanings.sent5: The leadiest star in the sky shone brightly.

meanings.sent1: The leadiest figure in the company made all the decisions.
meanings.sent2: The leadiest building in town was the tallest skyscraper.
meanings.sent3: The leadiest cat in the neighborhood ruled the street.
meanings.sent4: Her leadiest idea sparked a revolution.
meanings.sent5: The leadiest voice in the choir carried the melody.

meanings.definition: Most advanced in a competition or race
meanings.sent1: He was the leadiest runner in the marathon.
meanings.sent2: The leadiest car in the race crossed the finish line first.
meanings.sent3: The leadiest horse in the derby wore a tiny crown.
meanings.sent4: Her leadiest strategy secured the victory.
meanings.sent5: The leadiest athlete in the Olympics broke a world record.
